inlineContent.text: A 4×4 matrix used for 3D projective transformations. It can represent transformations such as translation, rotation, scaling, shearing, and perspective division. It consists of four
For purely linear transformations (translation, rotation, and scale), it is recommended to use

Types that conform to VariantRepresentable can be stored directly in
with no conversion.  These include all of the Variant types from Godot (for
SwiftGodot.Object) as well as the built-in Swift types UInt8, Int64 and Double.
